title: Chair
description: Back legs flat-sided, front legs flat excepting rounded front face; legs curve outward towar bottom, and back legs incline toward each other at bottom.  Corner posts of back terminate in a double curve with elementary volute form.  Flat top rail bowed toward back, slightly arched, with a rectangular panel of inset veneer surrounded by beading.   Splat horizontal, composed of small oblong faced with veneer, flanked on either side by horizontal coupled C-scrolls deeply carved with foliage, terminating in volutes.  Seat flares from back to front, with straight edges.
name: Chair
